TopicTitle: NASA doing it the kerbal way?

Articles.Content:
With the NASA-pack and asteroids announced I think that this would be a fun addition:

I mean, what is more kerbal than formation flying with an asteroid while attempting to take a surface sample and making sure you don't become a surface sample.

Also if you want you can have your name hitch a ride on the OSIRIS-REx:

http://www.planetary.org/get-involved/messages/bennu/
